name: QuickStrat
description:
A quick turn based strategy game. Is capable of multiplayer over a network or locally.

No tutorial of any kind is available in the first release.

To start a local game

  • click on "Local Game" Option
  • click plus to create countries to play as
  • select a country to play as by clicking on it (all unselected countries will be played by the AI)
  • Select options for the world from dropdown menus
  • Click Start Game

To start a network game

  • click on "Start Server" Option
  • click plus to create countries to play as
  • select a country to play as by clicking on it (all unselected countries will be played by the AI)
  • Select options for the world from dropdown menus
  • Click Start Game

To connect to a server

  • click on "Connect to Server"
  • enter an ip with a hosted server
  • click "Connect"
  • choose 1+ countries to play as
  • click "Ready" button

Game basics

  • Create a unit anywhere in your territory
  • Move a unit by clicking on it
  • A unit can attack after it has moved.
  • your land troops need supply, which is provided by the logistics unit
  • A unit out of supply is useless after one turn, and dies after five
  • your units have a range, and each land tile has an engagement range, pay attention to it
  • Ranged units cannot move and fire
  • Air units have to come back to the airport or carrier to resupply
  • Transports teleport up to 3 units from their airfield to an adjacent
  • Buildings have to be a certain distance apart, depending on the building
  • Naval units can be out of supply for extended periods of time
  • Transports can form convoys if they are within travel distance of each other
  • Units can instantly move between transport convoys
